title: Salmon tartare

ingredients.content: 250 g fresh salmon fillets, diced (3 cm)
¼ tsp salt, adjust to taste
4 pinches ground black pepper, adjust to taste

preparations.content: Place coriander and shallots in mixing bowl then chop <b>Turbo/2 sec/2 times<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add salmon, lime juice, olive oil, capers, salt and pepper then mix <b>Turbo/0.5 sec/2-3 times<b>. Do not over-process, mixture should be chopped and not minced. Set aside to rest for about 20 minutes for flavours to mellow.
Using 6 ring moulds (Ø 7 cm), divide mixture between them. Remove moulds before serving chilled with salad.

hintsAndTricks: Only use very fresh, high quality fish that is suitable for raw consumption.
